Motion3DFile
loopTime 60
isLoop 1
boneMotionDatas{ 2
	boneMotionData{ 2
		time 0 0 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 30 0
		time 30 0 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 30 0
	}
	boneMotionData{ 4
		time 0 1 0.000000 0.000000 0.300000 30 0
		time 30 1 0.000000 0.000000 -0.300000 30 0
		time 0 0 0.000000 1.000000 0.300000 30 0
		time 30 0 0.000000 -1.000000 -0.300000 30 0
	}
}
END
